CMS_WorkflowAction.ActionDescription: Using this step, you can update the contact with information from Data.com. You need to be logged in to Data.com in Kentico for this service to work.

CMS_WorkflowAction.ActionParameters: <form><field column="DeferredReplication" fieldcaption="{$sf.automation.deferredreplication$}" visible="true" defaultvalue="false" columntype="boolean" fieldtype="CustomUserControl" fielddescription="{$sf.automation.deferredreplication.description$}" publicfield="false" guid="a828d100-00ac-4645-86ed-0d25beacf350" visibility="none"><settings><controlname>checkboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field></form>
CMS_WorkflowAction.ActionDescription: Using this step, you can replicate the contact into Salesforce as a lead.
When a page reaches this step, the system sends out email messages to users involved in the step that immediately follows.

CMS_WorkflowAction.ActionDescription: Using this step, you can automatically submit a page for translation to a specified translation service. When a page reaches this step, the system creates a new culture version of the page and sets its translation status to Waiting for translation.
When a page reaches this step, the system imports submitted translations of the page.
